column1: 399599,Performing Arts Road Manager,,"Monitor work environment to ensure safety or adherence to specifications
column3: Monitor loading processes to ensure they are performed properly
column5: Notify others of emergencies, problems or hazards
column7: Plan production or operational procedures or sequences
column15: Direct material handling or moving activities
column21: Inspect material-moving equipment to detect problems
column23: Estimate technical or resource requirements for development or production projects
column25: Communicate work orders or plans to co-workers
column29: Ensure passenger compliance with vehicle safety, regulations and standards
